author: singh-ramanpreet
body:
#### PR description:
- New training files (UL18) and configs are added for Pileup Jet Id (AK4CHS), presented [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/973155/#69-ul18-pu-jet-id-wp-update)
- Uses the same working points as for UL17

#### PR validation:
- Test with https://github.com/cms-data/RecoJets-JetProducers/pull/12
- Passes `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

FYI: @alefisico @camclean @marinakolosova
title: Pileup Id training for UL18
